messages.title: LOCAL PEOPLE ARE BACKING NEIL CARMICHAEL AND THERESA MAY
messages.content: For the past seven years Neil Carmichael has been working tirelessly for our area overcoming obstacles such as opposition when establishing free schools or addressing the funding formula changes for schools.

issues.economy: Neil has been unstintingly supportive of our area’s growing creative and innovation-based businesses.
issues.education: For the past seven years Neil Carmichael has been working tirelessly for our area overcoming obstacles such as opposition when establishing free schools or addressing the funding formula changes for schools.

politicalExperience.achievements: One of Carmichael's achievements … has been to lead his Education Select Committee to deliver unanimous, cross-party reports on political hot potatoes.

endorsements.endorsement: Neil was so looking forward to taking our son to meet the Prime Minister with our other applicants.
Neil has been unstintingly supportive of our area's growing creative and innovation-based businesses.
Neil’s fight meant that Olivia’s SEN budget was transferred to her new school, with no delay, ensuring she can now ride a horse under support she’s already flourishing.
Neil took swift and effective action to deal with the consequences of landslides along the B4068. I am immensely grateful to him as it was on his intervention my life was not put at more risk.
The road will soon be properly resurfaced.

quotes.text: One of Carmichael's achievements … has been to lead his Education Select Committee to deliver unanimous, cross-party reports on political hot potatoes.
